headline: Ventas Announces Underwritten Offering of 10.6 Million Shares of Common Stock
summary: CHICAGO, November 13, 2024--Ventas, Inc. (NYSE: VTR) ("Ventas" or the "Company") announced today that it is commencing an underwritten public offering of 10,600,000 shares of its common stock in connection with the forward sale agreement described below.
